message:
SYSTEM: 03.Vocabularios-LD_v5.pdf: Página 91
Semantic Technologies in the Web of Data.  Red.es.   4th December 2012 
adms: Asset Description Metadata Schema 
•
The adms vocabulary describes concepts related to Semantic 
Interoperability Assets.  
•
It includes concepts as Semantic Asset Repository, Semantic 
Asset and Semantic Asset Distribution, that are 
specialisations of more general concepts as Repository, Asset 
and Distribution. 
•
It has been created as part of the Interoperability solutions for 
European public administrations (ISA) programme of the 
European Commission (EC). 
93 
•
http://www.w3.org/ns/adms#
speaker: SYSTEM
